hymn.title: Praise Him, praise Him, all ye little children

layout.singingstanza: Praise Him, praise Him, all ye lit -- tle chil -- dren, God is love, God is love; Praise Him, praise Him, all ye lit -- tle chil -- dren, God is love, God is love.

lyrics.stanza: Praise Him, praise Him, all ye little children, God is love, God is love; Praise Him, praise Him, all ye little children, God is love, God is love.
Love Him, love Him, all ye little children, God is love, God is love; Love Him, love Him, all ye little children, God is love, God is love.
Thank Him, thank Him, all ye little children, God is love, God is love; Thank Him, thank Him, all ye little children, God is love, God is love.
